infos.value: Are my masters. Sir Owe and Sir Seymore.
This is Raviesse. I found her collapsed on the shore.
Your masters drink while the sun yet shines overhead...?
Hah hah hah! A critic, I see.
Ahh... There is nothing better than a cold drink on a warm afternoon.
These two are samurai from the east. Has your illusion been dispelled yet?
To think I crossed the raging seas to a distant land for this...
You still have much to learn. Hah hah hah!
The intensity of your bloodlust blinds you to the presence of others.
Now that I think about it, there was another blindly out for blood who drifted here not a fortnight ago.
Oh, my. He never said anything about a man, did he? Hah hah hah!
